title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a REST API and CLI for macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (npm: ollama).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama API (PyPI: ollama).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (renamed to Open WebUI).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with fluent API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced CLI wrapper around Ollama with extra utilities.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team to use local models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes and examples for deploying and using Ollama.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake for reproducible Ollama builds and dev shells.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for running Ollama in Kubernetes.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) published to Docker Hub.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate for the Ollama API with async support.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with both sync and async APIs.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama (module github.com/ollama/ollama/api).

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that queries local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app to bring Ollama LLMs into Slack channels.
